gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 112, Magic 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeat the Magic, 112-92. Tyrese Maxey (23 points, six rebounds) and Tobias Harris (22 points, seven rebounds) combine for 45 in the victory, while Franz Wagner tallied 24 points, five rebounds and three assists for the Magic in the losing effort. The 76ers improve to 21-9 on the season, while the Magic fall to 18-12.
